headline.print_headline: Sears Worker in Upstate New York Dies After Shelves Collapse
headline.main: Sears Worker in Upstate New York Dies After Shelves Collapse

docs.snippet: A Sears employee in northern New York has died of injuries suffered when storage racks at the store collapsed and pinned him underneath, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Sears employee in northern New York has died of injuries suffered when storage racks at the store collapsed and pinned him underneath, authorities said.

headline.main: From the Friedman Forum: ‘What Is a Job Today, and Who Is Getting Hired?’

docs.snippet: Remarks delivered by Thomas L. Friedman at the start of his second Next New World conference, in San Francisco....
docs.abstract: Remarks delivered by Thomas L. Friedman at the start of his second Next New World conference, in San Francisco.

headline.main: Now Screening | Travels With Agnès Varda

docs.snippet: The doyenne of French New Wave cinema, now in her 80s, has just released an enchanting five-part travel series in which she visits old friends like Chris Marker and Anouk Aimée, and makes some new ones too....
docs.abstract: The doyenne of French New Wave cinema, now in her 80s, has just released an enchanting five-part travel series in which she visits old friends like Chris Marker and Anouk Aimée, and makes some new ones too.

headline.print_headline: Icahn, Mickelson Are Investigated in US Insider Trading Probe-Source
headline.main: Icahn, Mickelson Are Investigated in US Insider Trading Probe-Source

docs.snippet: The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation and the Securities and Exchange Commission are investigating possible insider trading involving billionaire investor Carl Icahn, golfer Phil Mickelson and Las Vegas gambler William Walters, a source familia...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation and the Securities and Exchange Commission are investigating possible insider trading involving billionaire investor Carl Icahn, golfer Phil Mickelson and Las Vegas gambler William Walters, a source familiar with the matter said.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Indicts Romanian for Crimes of Hacker 'Guccifer'
headline.main: U.S. Indicts Romanian for Crimes of Hacker 'Guccifer'

docs.snippet: A Romanian citizen has been indicted by a U.S. federal grand jury on charges that he, as the hacker "Guccifer," posted data stolen from email and social media accounts of U.S. celebrities and politicians, the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursd...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Romanian citizen has been indicted by a U.S. federal grand jury on charges that he, as the hacker "Guccifer," posted data stolen from email and social media accounts of U.S. celebrities and politicians, the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Neil Patrick Harris Leaving 'Hedwig' on Broadway
headline.main: Neil Patrick Harris Leaving 'Hedwig' on Broadway

docs.snippet: Neil Patrick Harris will leave hit Broadway show "Hedwig and the Angry Inch" and Andrew Rannells will slip into his old wigs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Neil Patrick Harris will leave hit Broadway show "Hedwig and the Angry Inch" and Andrew Rannells will slip into his old wigs.

headline.print_headline: Disney Sees Infinity Game's Retail Sales Hitting $1 Billion
headline.main: Disney Sees Infinity Game's Retail Sales Hitting $1 Billion

docs.snippet: Walt Disney Co expects global retail sales from its 10-month-old Infinity video game to reach $1 billion even as rivals also combine physical toys with video games, Jimmy Pitaro, president of the company's interactive unit, said in an interview....
docs.lead_paragraph: Walt Disney Co expects global retail sales from its 10-month-old Infinity video game to reach $1 billion even as rivals also combine physical toys with video games, Jimmy Pitaro, president of the company's interactive unit, said in an interview.

headline.print_headline: Alabama Republicans Say Voter Fraud Found After Offering Reward
headline.main: Alabama Republicans Say Voter Fraud Found After Offering Reward

docs.snippet: Alabama Republicans, who offered a $1,000 reward for substantiated reports of voter fraud in this month's primary elections, said on Thursday they plan to forward credible evidence of wrongdoing to state prosecutors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alabama Republicans, who offered a $1,000 reward for substantiated reports of voter fraud in this month's primary elections, said on Thursday they plan to forward credible evidence of wrongdoing to state prosecutors.

headline.print_headline: Tempers Flare as Rockies Beat Braves 10-3
headline.main: Tempers Flare as Rockies Beat Braves 10-3

docs.snippet: Corey Dickerson hit Atlanta catcher Gerald Laird with his backswing and tempers quickly flared, setting off a tense sequence and leading to several ejections Thursday as the Colorado Rockies beat the Braves 10-3....
docs.lead_paragraph: Corey Dickerson hit Atlanta catcher Gerald Laird with his backswing and tempers quickly flared, setting off a tense sequence and leading to several ejections Thursday as the Colorado Rockies beat the Braves 10-3.

headline.print_headline: Game 4 of Stanley Cups Finals Draws 2.0 Rating
headline.main: Game 4 of Stanley Cups Finals Draws 2.0 Rating

docs.snippet: The New York Rangers' victory over the Los Angeles Kings on Wednesday night in Game 4 of the Stanley Cup finals averaged 3,383,000 viewers and a 2.0 rating on NBC Sports Network...
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York Rangers' victory over the Los Angeles Kings on Wednesday night in Game 4 of the Stanley Cup finals averaged 3,383,000 viewers and a 2.0 rating on NBC Sports Network
